Sentencas: NiO/YSZ composite particles were synthesized via a co-precipitation of hydroxides.
Titulo: NiO/YSZ nanocomposite particles synthesized via co-precipitation method for electrochemically active Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: We investigated the effect of pH on the morphology of the composite particles, as well as on the microstructure and the electrochemical property of the Ni/YSZ anode.
Titulo: NiO/YSZ nanocomposite particles synthesized via co-precipitation method for electrochemically active Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: The particles synthesized at pH 10 involved aggregated composites and large NiO.
Titulo: NiO/YSZ nanocomposite particles synthesized via co-precipitation method for electrochemically active Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: The particles resulted in coarse and inhomogeneous anode microstructure and moderate area specific resistance (ASR) as 0.57 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C under open circuit voltage (OCV).
Titulo: NiO/YSZ nanocomposite particles synthesized via co-precipitation method for electrochemically active Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: Contrarily, nano-sized composite particles were successfully synthesized at pH 13.
Titulo: NiO/YSZ nanocomposite particles synthesized via co-precipitation method for electrochemically active Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: The particles provided fine as well as homogeneous Porous structure with the grain size in the range 200-400 nm and low ASR as 0.36 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C under OCV.
Titulo: NiO/YSZ nanocomposite particles synthesized via co-precipitation method for electrochemically active Ni/YSZ anode
